trans-unit.source: Manages storage of role-membership information for an ASP.NET application in an authorization-manager policy store, either in an XML file, in an Active Directory, or on an Active Directory Application Mode server.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 文件中、Active Directory 中或 Active Directory 应用程序模式服务器上管理 ASP.NET 应用程序的角色成员资格信息在授权管理器策略存储区中的存储。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> and <xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal> classes to provide role-management services for an ASP.NET application using an authorization-manager store.
trans-unit.target: 此类由<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>和<xref:System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal>类来提供 ASP.NET 应用程序使用授权管理器存储的角色管理服务。

trans-unit.source: You can use role management to specify different levels of authorization for your application.
trans-unit.target: 角色管理可用于为你的应用程序指定不同级别的授权。

trans-unit.source: The authorization manager can be accessed using the Microsoft Management Console.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 Microsoft 管理控制台访问的授权管理器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object works with both Windows authentication and forms authentication modes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象窗体身份验证模式和适用于这两个 Windows 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: You can configure the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object to use either a local XML file or an Active Directory or Active Directory Application Mode (ADAM) server.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>要使用本地的 XML 文件或 Active Directory 或 Active Directory 应用程序模式 (ADAM) 服务器对象。

trans-unit.source: When using a local file, the connection string should look like the following example.
trans-unit.target: 使用本地文件时，连接字符串应类似下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: If the local file is stored in the directory tree of an ASP.NET Web application, you can use the tilde ("~") character to indicate the root directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果本地文件存储在 ASP.NET Web 应用程序的目录树中，你可以使用波形符 ("~") 字符，用于指示的根目录。

trans-unit.source: For example, to indicate that the local file is stored in the Web application's data directory, you would use a connection string similar to the following example.
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要指示，本地文件存储在 Web 应用程序的数据目录中，将使用类似于下面的示例连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: Storing an XML data file in the Web application directory is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: 在 Web 应用程序目录中存储 XML 数据文件是一个潜在的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: By default, IIS will serve XML data files to the Web.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，IIS 将提供给 Web 的 XML 数据文件。

trans-unit.source: To improve security when using a local data file in an ASP.NET application, you should store the data file in the `App_Data` directory.
trans-unit.target: 为了提高安全性，使用 ASP.NET 应用程序中的本地数据文件时，应将存储中的数据文件`App_Data`目录。

trans-unit.source: Files stored in the `App_Data` directory will not be served to the Web.
trans-unit.target: 文件存储在`App_Data`目录将不会发送到 Web。

trans-unit.source: If you are using an Active Directory or ADAM server for the policy store, your connection string should be similar to the following example.
trans-unit.target: 如果为策略存储区中使用的 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器，你的连接字符串应类似于下面的示例。

trans-unit.source: The exceptions listed in the documentation for <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object methods are the exceptions that are raised by the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object.
trans-unit.target: 列出有关的文档中的异常<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象方法是引发的异常<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象。

trans-unit.source: Since the provider relies on the underlying Authentication Manager runtime, a <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException> exception may be thrown whenever the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object forwards a method call to the Authentication Manager runtime.
trans-unit.target: 由于提供程序依赖于基础身份验证管理器运行时，<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.COMException>异常可能是每当引发<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象将转发到身份验证管理器运行时方法调用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object has the following requirements for running in partial-trust environments:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象具有在部分信任环境中运行的以下要求：

trans-unit.source: When using a file-based policy store in an ASP.NET application, the file I/O permissions granted by the current trust level determine whether read and write actions are allowed by the provider.
trans-unit.target: 当使用基于文件的策略存储区 ASP.NET 应用程序中，当前的信任级别授予的文件 I/O 权限确定是否读取和写入操作所允许的提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET application must have read permission on the file to read data from the policy store, and must have write permission to save new information or update existing information in the policy store.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 应用程序必须具有读取权限，才能从策略存储中，读取数据文件，并且必须具有写权限以便保存新的信息或更新现有策略存储中的信息。

trans-unit.source: The default Medium-trust policy file gives an ASP.NET application read/write permissions in its application directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认中等信任策略文件授予其应用程序目录中的 ASP.NET 应用程序读/写权限。

trans-unit.source: The default Low-trust policy file only gives an ASP.NET application read permission in its application directory.
trans-unit.target: 默认值低信任级别策略文件只授予读取权限在其应用程序目录中的 ASP.NET 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the process identity under which the ASP.NET application runs must have file-system permissions to read and/or write the policy file.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在其下运行 ASP.NET 应用程序的进程标识必须具有文件系统权限以读取和/或写策略文件。

trans-unit.source: When using an Active Directory or ADAM server, the ASP.NET application needs unmanaged-code permission because the internal <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object code uses COM interop.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Active Directory 或 ADAM 服务器时，ASP.NET 应用程序需要非托管代码的权限，因为内部<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象代码使用 COM 互操作。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> object outside of ASP.NET, the calling code needs unmanaged-code permission.
trans-unit.target: 使用时<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>对象在 ASP.NET 外，调用代码需要非托管代码的权限。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows a Web.config file set to use the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> for role management.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示设置为使用的 Web.config 文件<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>为角色管理。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.%23ctor%2A> constructor is called by ASP.NET to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> class as specified in the configuration for the application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.%23ctor%2A> ASP.NET 创建的实例将调用构造函数<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>为应用程序的配置中指定的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不应在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: A string array of user names to be added to the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到指定的角色的用户名的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: A string array of role names to add the specified user names to.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，其中包含要将指定用户名添加到的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified user names to each of the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: 将指定用户名添加到每个指定的角色。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.AddUsersToRoles%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to associate one or more users with one or more roles in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.AddUsersToRoles%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类将一个或多个用户与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储区中的一个或多个角色关联。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUserToRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUserToRoles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUsersToRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUsersToRoles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUserToRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUserToRoles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUsersToRole%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.AddUsersToRoles%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从角色中删除用户。

trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: One of the specified user names is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的用户名之一为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the specified role names is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的角色名之一为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleNames" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the specified user names is an empty string or contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: 指定的用户名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号 (,)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the specified role names is an empty string or contains a comma (,).
trans-unit.target: 指定的角色名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号 (,)。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="usernames" /> contains a duplicate element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="usernames" /> 包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleNames" /> contains a duplicate element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleNames" /> 包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="applicationName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="applicationName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="scopeName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="scopeName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要存储和检索其角色信息的授权存储应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name of the authorization store application for which to store and retrieve role information.
trans-unit.target: 要存储和检索其角色信息的授权存储应用程序的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is the <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath" /> property value for the current <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Request" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为当前 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Web.HttpContext.Request" /> 属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> is used by the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> to associate users and roles with different authorization-manager applications, which enables multiple ASP.NET applications to use the same authorization-manager policy store to store role information without running into conflicts between duplicate role names.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>由<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>要将用户和角色关联的不同的授权管理器应用程序，使多个 ASP.NET 应用程序以使用相同的授权管理器策略存储来存储角色信息而未重复的角色名称之间发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, multiple ASP.NET applications can use the same policy store by specifying the same value in the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 或者，多个 ASP.NET 应用程序可以通过指定相同的值中使用相同的策略存储<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property can be set programmatically, or it can be set declaratively in the application's Web.config file by using the `applicationName` attribute.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>可以以编程方式设置属性也可以设置以声明方式在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中使用`applicationName`属性。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified for the `applicationName` attribute in the Web.config file, then the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property value for the current <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> object is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有为指定值`applicationName`属性在 Web.config 文件中，则<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>当前属性值<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Request%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>使用对象。

trans-unit.source: Authorization-manager application names cannot contain the "/" character that is included in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 授权管理器应用程序名称不能包含"/"字符中包含<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.ApplicationPath%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the default value for the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property cannot be used as an authorization-manager application name, and in the application's Web.config file, you must always specify an `applicationName` attribute in the `provider` element to configure your <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> instance.
trans-unit.target: 因此，默认值为<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性不能用作授权管理器应用程序名称，并在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中，你必须始终指定`applicationName`属性中`provider`元素来配置你<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>实例。

trans-unit.source: Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 因为所有服务的请求使用单个默认角色提供程序实例<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>有多个用户的应用程序时，属性值可能导致意外行为。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property unless you must.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你避免编写代码，用户可设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性除非必要，否则。

trans-unit.source: An example of an application where setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的示例设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的角色数据。

trans-unit.source: Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the element in the `system.web` section of the Web.config file for an ASP.NET application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示中的元素`system.web`的 ASP.NET 应用程序的 Web.config 文件的部分。

trans-unit.source: It specifies the application's <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> instance and sets the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A> property to `MyApplication`.
trans-unit.target: 它指定应用程序的<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>实例并设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName%2A>属性`MyApplication`。

trans-unit.source: An attempt was made to set the <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName" /> to a string that is longer than 256 characters.
trans-unit.target: 尝试将 <see cref="P:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ApplicationName" /> 设置为长于 256 个字符的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of minutes between refreshes of the cache of the policy-store data.
trans-unit.target: 获取策略存储数据区的缓存刷新间隔时间（分钟数）。

trans-unit.source: The number of minutes between refreshes of cached policy-store data.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的策略存储区数据的刷新间隔时间（分钟数）。

trans-unit.source: The default is 60.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 60。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to create.
trans-unit.target: 要创建的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new role to the role authorization-manager policy store.
trans-unit.target: 将一个新角色添加到角色授权管理器策略存储区。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.CreateRole%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to create a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.CreateRole%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储中创建角色。

trans-unit.source: Role names are not case sensitive.
trans-unit.target: 角色名称不区分大小写。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a new role in the authorization-manager policy store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例在授权管理器策略存储区中创建新的角色。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 包含一个逗号。

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="applicationName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="applicationName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="scopeName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="scopeName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to delete.
trans-unit.target: 要删除的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, throws an exception if <c>roleName</c> has one or more members.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则当 <c>roleName</c> 包含一个或多个成员时引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Removes a role from the authorization-manager policy store.
trans-unit.target: 从授权管理器策略存储区中移除角色。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the role was deleted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果角色已删除，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.DeleteRole%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to delete a role from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.DeleteRole%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中删除角色。

trans-unit.source: When a role is deleted, the list of users associated with that role is also deleted from the policy store.
trans-unit.target: 当删除角色时，与该角色关联的用户列表也将删除从策略存储区。

trans-unit.source: The user information in the database is not affected.
trans-unit.target: 不会影响数据库中的用户信息。

trans-unit.source: If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `true`, then an exception will be thrown and the role will not be deleted if the role identified by the `roleName` parameter has one or more members.
trans-unit.target: 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`true`然后将引发异常，将不删除此角色，如果通过标识角色`roleName`参数具有一个或多个成员。

trans-unit.source: If `throwOnPopulatedRole` is `false`, then the role will be deleted whether it is empty or not.
trans-unit.target: 如果`throwOnPopulatedRole`是`false`，则它是空的还是不会删除此角色。

trans-unit.source: The following example deletes a role from the authorization-manager policy store.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例从授权管理器策略存储区中删除一个角色。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 包含一个逗号。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> has one or more members and <paramref name="throwOnPopulatedRole" /> is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 具有一个或多个成员且 <paramref name="throwOnPopulatedRole" /> 为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="scopeName" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: The role to search in.
trans-unit.target: 作为搜索范围的角色。

trans-unit.source: The user name to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的用户名。

trans-unit.source: This method is not supported by the authorization store role provider.
trans-unit.target: 授权存储区角色提供程序不支持此方法。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the users whose user name matches <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> and who are members of the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，包含用户名与 <paramref name="usernameToMatch" /> 匹配且是指定角色的成员的所有用户的名称。

trans-unit.source: An unsupported method was called.
trans-unit.target: 调用了不受支持的方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of all the roles for the application.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用程序的所有角色的列表。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the roles stored in the authorization-manager policy store for a particular application.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，包含在特定应用程序的授权管理器策略存储区中存储的所有角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetAllRoles%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to retrieve a list of all the roles in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetAllRoles%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类，以检索在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的所有角色的列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetAllRoles%2A> method to get the list of roles for an application and bind the results to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetAllRoles%2A>方法获取应用程序的角色的列表，并将绑定到结果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="applicationName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="applicationName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="scopeName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="scopeName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: The user to return a list of roles for.
trans-unit.target: 要为其返回角色列表的用户。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the roles that a user is in.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个用户所属角色的列表。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the roles that the specified user is in.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，其中包含指定用户所属的所有角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to retrieve a list of a specified user's roles from the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储中检索指定的用户角色的列表。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A> method to retrieve a list of roles for a specified user and binds them to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetRolesForUser%2A>方法来检索指定用户角色的列表，并将绑定到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="username" /> 包含一个逗号。

trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to get the list of users for.
trans-unit.target: 要获取其用户列表的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of users in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 获取属于指定角色的用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of all the users who are members of the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，其中包含指定角色拥有的所有成员的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to retrieve the list of users associated with the specified role in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类来检索与在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的指定角色关联的用户的列表。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A> method only returns user names that are directly contained in the authorization-manager role specified by the `roleName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A>方法仅返回直接包含的用户名称中由指定的授权管理器角色`roleName`参数。

trans-unit.source: The underlying authorization-manager API called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A> method does not support group expansion, so users contained in nested NT groups, nested authorization-manager groups, and LDAP query groups will not be returned.
trans-unit.target: 基础授权管理器 API 调用<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.GetUsersInRole%2A>方法不支持组扩展，因此不会返回嵌套的 NT 组、 嵌套的授权管理器组和 LDAP 查询组中包含的用户。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetUsersInRole%2A> method to get a list of the users in a particular role and bind the results to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.GetUsersInRole%2A>方法以对特定角色中获取的用户的列表，并将绑定到结果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView?displayProperty=nameWithType>控件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance to initialize.
trans-unit.target: 要初始化的 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例的名称。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" /> that contains the names and values of configuration options for the role provider.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection" />，包含角色提供程序的配置选项的名称和值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the authorization-manager role provider with the property values specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件中指定的属性值初始化授权管理器角色提供程序。

trans-unit.source: This method is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不能直接在代码中使用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.Initialize%2A> method initializes the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider> with the property values specified in the ASP.NET application configuration file (Web.config) and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.Initialize%2A>方法初始化<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>与属性值指定在 ASP.NET 应用程序配置文件 (Web.config) 中，并且不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="config" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="config" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute is empty or does not exist in the [connectionStrings Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de) configuration section.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 属性为空或在 [connectionStrings 元素（ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6ffbb2e-a4d1-410e-8f7e-9755e92c65de)配置部分中不存在。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: 配置的 <see langword="applicationName" /> 的长度超过 256 个字符。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The configuration for this <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance contains an unrecognized attribute.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例的配置包含无法识别的特性。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET application is not running at <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Low" /> trust or higher.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 应用程序未在 <see cref="F:System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel.Low" /> 信任级别或更高级别下运行。

trans-unit.source: The user name to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的用户名。

trans-unit.source: The role to search in.
trans-unit.target: 作为搜索范围的角色。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified user is in the specified role.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个指示指定用户是否属于指定角色的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified user name is in the specified role; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的用户名属于指定角色，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class and the <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to determine whether a user is associated with a role in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.IsUserInRole%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类和<xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal.IsInRole%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.User%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性来确定用户是否为 ASP.NET 应用程序中指定授权管理器数据存储区中的角色相关联配置文件 (Web.config)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example programmatically checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例以编程方式检查以确定登录的用户是否管理员角色允许用户查看用户角色之前。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.

trans-unit.source: A string array of user names to be removed from the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，其中包含要从指定的角色移除的用户名。

trans-unit.target: 一个字符串数组，其中包含要将指定的用户名从中移除的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified user names from the specified roles.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定角色中的指定用户名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.RemoveUsersFromRoles%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to remove one or more users from one or more roles in the authorization-manager policy store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.RemoveUsersFromRoles%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类，以从 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器策略存储区中的一个或多个角色中删除一个或多个用户。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRole%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A>, <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUsersFromRole%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUsersFromRoles%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class.
trans-unit.target: 调用此方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRole%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUserFromRoles%2A>， <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUsersFromRole%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RemoveUsersFromRoles%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类。

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds one or more users to a role or removes a user from a role.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例向角色中添加一个或多个用户，或从角色中删除用户。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: One of the specified user names is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的用户名之一为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the specified role names is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的角色名之一为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="userNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userNames" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleNames" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleNames" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: One of the specified user names is an empty string or contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: 指定的用户名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: One of the specified role names is an empty string or contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: 指定的角色名之一为空字符串或是包含一个逗号。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="userNames" /> contains a duplicate element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="userNames" /> 包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleNames" /> contains a duplicate element.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleNames" /> 包含重复的元素。

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="applicationName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="applicationName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="scopeName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="scopeName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: The name of the role to search for in the authorization-manager policy store.
trans-unit.target: 要在授权管理器策略存储区中搜索的角色的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the specified role name already exists in the authorization-manager policy store.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示指定角色名是否已存在于授权管理器策略存储区中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the role name already exists in the authorization-manager policy store; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果角色名已存在于授权管理器策略存储区中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.RoleExists%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles> class to determine whether a role name exists in the authorization-manager data store specified in the ASP.NET application's configuration file (Web.config).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.RoleExists%2A>方法由调用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles>类以确定是否在 ASP.NET 应用程序的配置文件 (Web.config) 中指定的授权管理器数据存储中存在的角色名称。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses the <xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RoleExists%2A> method to determine whether a role name already exists before creating the role.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Web.Security.Roles.RoleExists%2A>方法来确定角色名称是否已存在之前创建该角色。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a Web.config file that enables role management, see <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 启用角色管理的 Web.config 文件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="roleName" /> contains a comma.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="roleName" /> 包含一个逗号。

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="applicationName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="applicationName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The configured <see langword="scopeName" /> was not found.
trans-unit.target: 未找到已配置的 <see langword="scopeName" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The authorization-manager runtime is not installed on the server.
trans-unit.target: 服务器上没有安装身份验证管理器运行时。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="connectionStringName" /> attribute references a connection string to a file that does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="connectionStringName" /> 特性引用了一个指向不存在的文件的连接字符串。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> instance is configured with a file-based policy store, and read access to the file is not allowed at the current trust level.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider" /> 实例使用基于文件的策略存储进行配置，且当前的信任级别不允许对文件进行读访问。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scope name for the authorization store.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置授权存储区的范围名。

trans-unit.source: The scope name for the authorization store.
trans-unit.target: 授权存储区的范围名。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A> property can be set using the `scopeName` configuration attribute for the provider instance in the `providers` section of the configuration section.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A>属性可以设置使用`scopeName`中的提供程序实例的配置属性`providers`在配置部分。

trans-unit.source: Because a single default role provider instance is used for all of the requests served by an <xref:System.Web.HttpApplication> object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 因为所有服务的请求使用单个默认角色提供程序实例<xref:System.Web.HttpApplication>对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A> property is not thread safe for multiple writes, and changing the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A> property value can result in unexpected behavior when there are multiple users of an application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A>属性不是线程安全的多个写操作，并不断变化<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A>有多个用户的应用程序时，属性值可能导致意外行为。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you avoid writing code that allows users to set the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A> property unless you must.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你避免编写代码，用户可设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A>属性除非必要，否则。

trans-unit.source: An example of an application where setting the <xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A> property may be required is an administrative application that manages role data for multiple applications.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的示例设置<xref:System.Web.Security.AuthorizationStoreRoleProvider.ScopeName%2A>属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的角色数据。

trans-unit.source: Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.
trans-unit.target: 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。
